messages.title: John Smith
messages.text: Welcome to our shelter. The recent apocalypse has left many displaced people in desperate need of shelter and food.

messages.title: John Smith
messages.text: We need to get them settled in quickly!

messages.title: John Smith
messages.text: Luckily there seems to be a house already. However, we will need more if we want to house everyone.

messages.title: Farmer John
messages.text: Every population needs food, a growing one more so. Let's build more farms.

messages.title: Power Worker
messages.text: It seems one of our workers has stumbled upon a working generator!

messages.title: Power Worker
messages.text: One generator won’t be enough to power a whole village though. Let’s build more!

messages.title: John Smith
messages.text: One of the workers discovered animal prints in the food storage. We should build a wall to keep any more scavengers out.

messages.title: General
messages.text: Quick, we need to build turrets before they get through!
